TLINE.TDLINE: There is a “Complete Delivery Required” flag in the customer master. If
the flag is checked, it indicates that a sales order must be delivered
complete in a single delivery. This flag is passed on to the sales
order. However the standard functionality of the flag is to allow
complete delivery only from a single plant for all line items. For
Wiley’s requirement, the sales orders may be shipped from multiple
plants with different shipping points. This enhancement is needed to
allow a single sales order to ship complete from multiple plants and
create a delivery documents in the background.
SAP generates an error message VL049 if processed in background (VL10*)
OSS Note 1895857 - Different behavior of message VL049 (The customer has
requested complete delivery) in transactions VL01N and VL10*
If all the Sales Document Item Quantities are fully confirmed, remove
the "Flag: Complete delivery defined for each sales order?
(VBAK-AUTLF)", so that SAP allows the Delivery creation even though
Items are delivered from different Plant / Shipping Point.
